original_text: Perhaps you want to tell a friend about his little mistake. If you want to tell him, first remember your own bigger mistakes.
korean_text: 어찌하여 형제의 눈 속에 있는 티는 보고 네 눈 속에 있는 들보는 깨닫지 못하느냐

sentences.original_text: Perhaps you want to tell a friend
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 당신은 친구에게 말하고 싶을지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: If you want to tell him
first remember your own bigger mistakes
sentences.korean_translation: 먼저 당신 자신의 더 큰 실수들을 기억하세요
